dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.ServiceSpecVersion
dataStructure.description:
This class represents the ability to distinguish between different instances of ServiceSpecifications. It represents a particular form or variety of a ServiceSpecification that is different from others or from the original. The form represents differences in attributes, methods, relationships, and/or constraints that characterize this particular ServiceSpecification, but which are not enough to warrant creating a new ServiceSpecification.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceSpecVersion

child.name: svcSpecRevisionName
child.description:
This defines the name of this revision of this ServiceSpecification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionName

child.name: svcSpecRevisionNumber
child.description:
This is the revision number of this instance. This includes subfileds such as major number, minor number, and so forth. The subfields are separated by a period delimited. The format of the subfields is provided in the revisionFormat attribute of this class.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionNumber

child.name: svcSpecRevisionReason
child.description:
This is a string that describes the reason for creating this version.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionReason

child.name: svcSpecRevisionSemantics
child.description:
This is a string that is used to define the particular semantics of this version. This string should include as a minimum a description of the format of the revisionNumber.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionSemantics

child.name: svcSpecRevisionTimestamp
child.description:
This defines the date and time of the revision.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionTimestamp

child.name: svcSpecRevisionValidityPeriod
child.description:
This defines the time period in which this revision is valid for.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionValidityPeriod

child.name: svcSpecRevisionFormat
child.description:
This attribute defines the specific revision format used in this version. Each field of the revision is separated by a period. For example, if the desired format is .>, then the value of this string could be: major-number.minor-number The semantics of the format should be described in the revisionSemantics attribute of this class.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: svcSpecRevisionFormat

child.name: serviceSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServSpecModifications

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceSpecification
